snippet.title: Dating a Vampire ~ Love or Die
snippet.description:
I might not be lucky in love but I am lucky in death. This is Love or Die, a short, horror visual novel game about dating monster girls, I thought it looked cute and fun so here we are.

Check it out here: https://viryse.itch.io/dod


* Here be my Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/famed_killjoy/

* I have a Twitter too I guess: https://twitter.com/FamedKilljoy
